title: End Game Rating
body:
Last game i played was a 37:23 min lenght.

I was playing ADC and ended up losing with a score of 10/4/6 172 CS for a total of 13.375 gold. IMO this is pretty good considering that the average KDA/CS of my team was 4.25/8.25/9 and 119.75 CS.

I ended up getting a end game rating of B+...

On top of that to make matters worse i had the most total damage done to champion 31.423 AND total damage dealt 146.112 of my team!

I even got 1 of the 3 tower we manage to get down...

 I mean i know i lost but ffs! i did all that and i only got an B+?

Comparing it now to a previous game i played not long ago.

I was top lane we ended up winning in a 24:43 min lenght. Ended up 4/2/4 159 CS total of 9.299 gold. Total dmg to champ 8.114/ total dmg done 77.953 and 1 inhib down by me.

I get an S+...

Where is the logic in that?! Can someone explain to me?

replies.body: end of game rating is not based on your K/D, it is based on your overall performance compared to other people playing the same champion and role.
Well for that they have to base themselves with something right?

What is that meant to mean?

It is based on how well other players perform, not some arbitrary value.
